name: Tank Firing
description:
When shooting, you should calibrate the shooting distance and pay attention to the weak points.
In case of armor that cannot be penetrated by armour piercing projectile, high explosive projectile can be tried.
When being hit, you should set a certain angle to improve the equivalent armor.
When encountering the shell which cannot be defended by armor, you can look for shelter.
Try to challenge the single enemy and evacuate when besieged.
Get on your tank and join the fight!
